smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function storeMetric has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function storeMetric has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function storeMetric has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function getDisplayData appears to be too complex.
The function onNavigationItemSelected appears to be too complex.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function getView is nested too deeply.
Function onBindViewHolder is nested too deeply.
Function deserialize is nested too deeply.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MackerelApiClient' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'MackerelApi' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface MackerelApi is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: EmptyDefaultConstructor
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: An empty default constructor can be removed.
An empty default constructor can be removed.
An empty default constructor can be removed.

smells.name: ThrowingExceptionsWithoutMessageOrCause
smells.description: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

instances.message: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

smells.name: PrintStackTrace
smells.description: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

instances.message: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: intent.getSerializableExtra(MONITOR_KEY) cannot be safely cast to MonitorDataResponse.
this cannot be safely cast to Context.
header.findViewById(R.id.user_thumbnail_image_view) cannot be safely cast to ImageView.
view.tag cannot be safely cast to ViewHolder.
view.tag cannot be safely cast to ViewHolder.
section.findViewById(R.id.title) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
layout.findViewById(R.id.title) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
layout.findViewById(R.id.detail) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
layout.findViewById(R.id.reason) cannot be safely cast to EditText.
arguments!!.getSerializable(MONITOR_KEY) cannot be safely cast to MonitorDataResponse.
activity cannot be safely cast to OnDeleteMetricsListener.
parentFragment cannot be safely cast to OnUpdateStatusListener.
(json as JsonObject).get("tsdbLatest") cannot be safely cast to JsonObject.
view.layoutParams cannot be safely cast to RecyclerView.LayoutParams.

smells.name: RedundantVisibilityModifierRule
smells.description: Checks for redundant visibility modifiers. Public is the default visibility for classes. The public modifier is redundant.

instances.message: testUserId is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
testGetGravatarImage is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
testStringFromEpoch is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
testStringDateFromEpoch is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
testStringToRequestName is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
testRequestNameToString is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
testStringToStatusColor is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (key == "standby" || key == "working") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: key == "standby" || key == "working"
Parentheses in (it.toInt() and 0xff) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it.toInt() and 0xff
Parentheses in (key == "standby" || key == "working") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: key == "standby" || key == "working"
Parentheses in ((paint.ascent() + paint.descent()) / 2.0f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (paint.ascent() + paint.descent()) / 2.0f

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.
An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function toRelativeTime has 5 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class MonitorDataResponse implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class AlertDataResponse implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
